DOC.brief_summary: A randomized, controlled trial to investigate the effects of a buteyko based remedial breathing therapy on children with asthma regarding to their symptoms, use of medication and lung function tests.
DOC.brief_title: Buteyko Based Remedial Breathing Therapy With Children With Asthma
DOC.criteria: signed informed consent of the parents age 6 15 years information and consent of the consulting doctor levels of asthma therapy 13 participation in another study
